blobs.changelog:
- Passwords handling changed to 'set and forget'.
- CSRF token in critical internal REST APIs.
- Possibility to flash other firmwares than P1IB official firmwares OTA removed.
- Bump ESP-IDF to v5.3
- Wi-Fi password length limited to 64 chars.
- Add authentication on factory reset API.

- MQTT password length increased to 64 chars.
- Items re-arranged in settings ui.
- Improved Wi-Fi mesh support (bssid selectable).
- Transformer ratio constant support.
- Additional broken STAR meter support.


Note. This version breaks compatibility with the homey app.

- Telegram interval measurement.
- Add additional main fuse values.
- Fix issue when AP SSID is hidden.
- Increase mqtt password length.
- Add ethernet support (P1IB-eth).
- improve STAR-meters corrupt data compensation.
- Improve wifi/mqtt connection/reconnect behavior.
- HA auto discovery UI switch.
- JSON payload improvements.
